wikipedia_page.main: William Summers Anderson (March 29, 1919 – June 29, 2021) was a British-American businessman who served as President and Chairman of the National Cash Register Corp (NCR) from 1972 to 1984.

response: * William S. Anderson (1919–2021), president and chairman of the National Cash Register Corp, 1972–1984
